bibl.title: Kakuju rec' proiznes by Gesiod ... (Oksirinkhskij papirus 3537 v e'o sootnesenii s anticnoj ritoriceskoj tradisciej). Avec résumé en anglais: "What oration Hesiod would have delivered ..." (P. Oxy. 50. 3537 in Its Relation to the Ancient Rhetoric Tradition).
bibl.note: Compares the stylistics and topics of P. Oxy. L, 3537 with other specimens of ethopoiia.
bibl.seg: JARKHO V.N., Kakuju rec' proiznes by Gesiod ... (Oksirinkhskij papirus 3537 v e'o sootnesenii s anticnoj ritoriceskoj tradisciej). Avec résumé en anglais: "What oration Hesiod would have delivered ..." (P. Oxy. 50. 3537 in Its Relation to the Ancient Rhetoric Tradition).
Compares the stylistics and topics of P. Oxy. L, 3537 with other specimens of ethopoiia.
